channel.title: [PI] NoClip command
channel.description: How would I make it so when people type ::noclip they get dc'ed and they have to log in again? Because I searched in commands but i can't find noclip and it seems to work for everyone. The server is PI based.

item.title: [PI] NoClip command
item.dc:creator: @kickyamom50 kickyamom50
item.description:
@kickyamom50 wrote:

[quote=“yB, post:4, topic:354506”]src\server\model\players\packets\Commands.java:38: cannot find symbol
symbol : variable command
location: class server.model.players.packets.Commands
if(command.startsWith(“noclip”)) {
^
src\server\model\players\packets\Commands.java:39: cannot find symbol
symbol : variable p
location: class server.model.players.packets.Commands
p.savegame(false);
^
src\server\model\players\packets\Commands.java:40: cannot find symbol
symbol : variable p
location: class server.model.players.packets.Commands
p.disconnected = true;
^
Note: Some input files use unchecked or unsafe operations.
Note: Recompile with -Xlint:unchecked for details.
3 errors
Press any key to continue . . .[/quote]

whenever you post something like that, make sure you code it like this, without the *
before you paste do, [code] then after you paste your information, do [/code], except do those without the *. it will look like this then

src\server\model\players\packets\Commands.java:38: cannot find symbol symbol : variable command location: class server.model.players.packets.Commands if(command.startsWith("noclip")) { ^ src\server\model\players\packets\Commands.java:39: cannot find symbol symbol : variable p location: class server.model.players.packets.Commands p.savegame(false); ^ src\server\model\players\packets\Commands.java:40: cannot find symbol symbol : variable p location: class server.model.players.packets.Commands p.disconnected = true; ^ Note: Some input files use unchecked or unsafe operations. Note: Recompile with -Xlint:unchecked for details. 3 errors Press any key to continue . . .

Read full topic

item.title: [PI] NoClip command
item.dc:creator: @i0wn3v3ry i0wn3v3ry
item.description:
@i0wn3v3ry wrote:

In your client.java, client sided, search “noclip” and change the command to something you will only remember.
or just simply remove it, but remember to make a backup incase you remove something on accident and get errors.

Read full topic

item.title: [PI] NoClip command
item.dc:creator: @b15 b15
item.description:
@b15 wrote:

the command is actually in your client surprisingly anyways her is the command to kick them.

if(command.startsWith("noclip")) {
p.savegame(false);
p.disconnected = true;
Yell(" " + username + " Tried To No-Clip And Has Been Kicked);
}

Read full topic
